DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate how Glucagon-Like Peptide 1 (GLP-1) affects kidney function in healthy young men. The hypothesis is that GLP-1 induces a positive effect on kidney hemodynamics.
DOC.brief_title: GLP-1: Acute Effects on Kidney Function in Healthy Men
DOC.criteria: Healthy young men Any chronic diseases
